feed.title: Cronicle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.77
entry.content:
• Fixed issue where check_user_exists API didn't require auth when free_accounts was false.
  • See Discussion: https://github.com/jhuckaby/Cronicle/discussions/882

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.78
entry.content:
• Now firing chain reaction for scheduler failures, if configured
  • Fixes #885

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.79
entry.content:
• FIxed issue with timeout error message precision after 1 hour
  • Fixes #895

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.80
entry.content: • Allow standard auth for get_job_log API. Fixes #896.

entry.title: New release for Cronicle: Version 0.9.81
entry.content:
• Fixes #903 - some ordinal day of month suffixes are incorrect
  • Adjust color label checkbox colors for better visibility
  • Updated TOC.
  • Added section on S3 compatible services (MinIO)
  • Update CHANGELOG.
